description: From French bleuet, diminutive of bleu (“blue”).

definitionGroups.group: Any of several different plants, from several genera, having bluish flowers.

entries.meaning: Centaurea, a plant genus in the family Asteraceae
Several plant genera in the family Rubiaceae, notably Houstonia and Oldenlandiopsis.
Any of several small damselfly species, including the genera Coenagrion and Enallagma.
